#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int test,i,j;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		int num,m=0;
		scanf("%d",&num);
		int num1=num,sum=0,su=0;
			while(num1>0)
		{
			
			su++;
			num1/=10;
		}
		int arr[10000];
		for(i=0;i<10000;i++)
		arr[i]=0;
		for(i=1;i<=9*su;i++)
		{
			sum=0;
			int ans=num-i;
		num1=num-i;
		while(num1>0)
		{
			int rem=num1%10;
			sum+=rem;
			num1/=10;
		}
		int num2=num-sum,sum2=0;
		while(num2>0)
		{
			int rem2=num2%10;
			sum2+=rem2;
			num2/=10;
		}
		if(sum==sum2)
		{
			if(ans+sum2==num){
			
		arr[m]=ans;
		m++;
		}}}
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<m-1;j++)
			{
				if(arr[j]>arr[j+1])
				{
					int t=arr[j];
					arr[j]=arr[j+1];
					arr[j+1]=t;
				}
			}
		}if(arr[0]>0)
		printf("%d\n",arr[0]);
		else
		printf("NONE\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
